trans-unit.target: Projek telah berjaya berjaya dimuat naik!

trans-unit.id: If you have any questions or suggestions, please send an email to {*emailLink*}.
trans-unit.source: If you have any questions or suggestions, please send an email to {*emailLink*}.
trans-unit.target: Jika ada sebarang pertanyaan, sila kirimkan emel kepada {*emailLink*}

trans-unit.id: The Catroid development team respects the intellectual property of others, as well as our users. If you believe that your work has been copied in a way that constitutes copyright infringement, please send us an {*emailLink*}.
trans-unit.source: The Catroid development team respects the intellectual property of others, as well as our users. If you believe that your work has been copied in a way that constitutes copyright infringement, please send us an {*emailLink*}.
trans-unit.target: Pasukan Catroid menghormati hasil karya orang lain, serta pengguna. Jika anda mendapati hasil kerja anda telah disalin dengan cara yang melanggar hakcipta, sila hantar {*emailLink*} kepada pihak kami.

trans-unit.id: We will promptly process and investigate notices of alleged infringement and will take appropriate actions under the {*directiveLink*} and other applicable intellectual property laws. Upon receipt, the Catroid development team may act expeditiously to remove or disable access to any material claimed to be infringing. Repeat infringers of third-party copyrights are subject to termination in appropriate circumstances.
trans-unit.source: We will promptly process and investigate notices of alleged infringement and will take appropriate actions under the {*directiveLink*} and other applicable intellectual property laws. Upon receipt, the Catroid development team may act expeditiously to remove or disable access to any material claimed to be infringing. Repeat infringers of third-party copyrights are subject to termination in appropriate circumstances.
trans-unit.target: Pihak kami akan memproses dan menyiasat notis penyerobohan hakcipta yang dikatakan itu dan akan mengambil tindakan yang sewajarnya di bawah {*directiveLink*} dan undang-undang lain.Selepas menyesahkan notis tersebut, pasukan Catroid boleh bertindak dengan pantas untuk menyingkirkan atau melumpuhkan akses kepada pihak yang melanggar hakcipta orang lain. Pihak ketiga kepada penceroboh hak cipta adalah tertakluk kepada penamatan dalam keadaan yang sesuai.

trans-unit.id: In assessing whether or not a Catroid user has violated your copyrights, please keep in mind that Catroid is an educational and not-for-profit initiative, seeking to aid children's learning by providing the tools for them to learn and express themselves using digital technology.
trans-unit.source: In assessing whether or not a Catroid user has violated your copyrights, please keep in mind that Catroid is an educational and not-for-profit initiative, seeking to aid children's learning by providing the tools for them to learn and express themselves using digital technology.
trans-unit.target: Dalam mengenal pasti samada pengguna Catroid telah melanggar hak cipta anda, sila ingat bahawa Catroid merupakan bukan satu inisiatif untuk mendapatkan keuntungan, malah ia adalah inisiatif pendidikan dan ingin membantu pembelajaran kanak-kanak dengan menyediakan alat-alat bagi mereka untuk belajar mengunakan teknologi digital.

trans-unit.id: We hope you also see Catroid not only as a good way of popularizing your creations/website but also as an opportunity to do something good for children's education.
trans-unit.source: We hope you also see Catroid not only as a good way of popularizing your creations/website but also as an opportunity to do something good for children's education.
trans-unit.target: Pihak kami beharap anda dapat melihat Catroid bukan sahaja sebagai tempat untuk mempopularkan laman web anda,tetapi juga sebagai salah satu platform untuk pembelajaran kanak-kanak

trans-unit.id: If you choose to make a copyright infringement complaint, please note that we may post your notification, with personally identifiable information redacted, to a clearinghouse such as {*chillingEffectsLink*}. Please also note that you may be liable for damages (including costs and attorneys' fees) if you materially misrepresent that an activity is infringing your copyright.
trans-unit.source: If you choose to make a copyright infringement complaint, please note that we may post your notification, with personally identifiable information redacted, to a clearinghouse such as {*chillingEffectsLink*}. Please also note that you may be liable for damages (including costs and attorneys' fees) if you materially misrepresent that an activity is infringing your copyright.
trans-unit.target: Jika para pangguna memilih untuk membuat aduan perlanggaran hak cipta, sila mengambil perhatian bahawa pihak kami boleh melaporkan aduan anda dengan maklumat peribadi disunting, clearing house seperti {*chilling EffectsLink*}. Sila ambil perhatian bahawa anda mungkin bertanggungjawab terhadap kerosakan (termasuk kos dan yuran peguam) jika anda membuat aduan yang tidak munasabah berdasarkan kesilapan anda sendiri.

trans-unit.id: Why do you think this project is inappropriate?
trans-unit.source: Why do you think this project is inappropriate?
trans-unit.target: Kenapa anda rasa projek ini tidak sesuai?

trans-unit.id: You can download this project directly to your mobile phone - when you have a barcode-reader app installed. Just open the app on your mobile phone and point the camera to the above QR-Code and the download will be started immediately.
trans-unit.source: You can download this project directly to your mobile phone - when you have a barcode-reader app installed. Just open the app on your mobile phone and point the camera to the above QR-Code and the download will be started immediately.
trans-unit.target: Anda boleh muat turun projek ini terus ke telefon bimbit anda - jika anda mempunyai aplikasi pembaca barkod. Anda cuma perlu buka aplikasi pada telefon bimbit anda dan halakan kamera ke arah kod-QR diatas dan projek akan dimuat turun dengan serta-merta.

trans-unit.id: You reported this project as inappropriate!
trans-unit.source: You reported this project as inappropriate!
trans-unit.target: Anda telah membuat laporan projek ini sebagai tidak sesuai!

trans-unit.id: Catroid is developed at the {*institute*} at Graz University of Technology in Austria.
trans-unit.source: Catroid is developed at the {*institute*} at Graz University of Technology in Austria.
trans-unit.target: Catroid dicipta di {*Institute*} Graz University of Technology di Austria

trans-unit.id: Please enable javascript in your browser.
trans-unit.source: Please enable javascript in your browser.
trans-unit.target: Sila mengaktifkan javascript di pelayar internet anda.

trans-unit.id: All projects shared on the Catroid website, as well as the Catroid support materials, are shared under the Creative Commons license with the conditions Attribution - Share Alike.
trans-unit.source: All projects shared on the Catroid website, as well as the Catroid support materials, are shared under the Creative Commons license with the conditions Attribution - Share Alike.
trans-unit.target: Semua projek yang dikongsi di laman web Catroid, serta bahan-bahan sokongan Catroid, dikongsi bersama dibawah lesen Creative Commons dengan syarat Perkongsian-Serupa.

trans-unit.id: The Catroid software and the Catroid website are completely free of charge. The source code of the Catroid software is available under the GNU General Public License {*emailLink1*}, the source code of the website is available under the GNU Affero General Public License {*emailLink2*}.
trans-unit.source: The Catroid software and the Catroid website are completely free of charge. The source code of the Catroid software is available under the GNU General Public License {*emailLink1*}, the source code of the website is available under the GNU Affero General Public License {*emailLink2*}.
trans-unit.target: Perisian Catroid dan laman web Catroid adalah percuma. Kod sumber perisian Catroid didapati di bawah Lesen GNU Awam {*emailLink1*}, manakala kod sumber laman web Catroid boleh didapati di bawah Lesen GNU Affero Awam Am {* emailLink2 *}.

trans-unit.id: You can visit the project at {*emailLink*}.
trans-unit.source: You can visit the project at {*emailLink*}.

trans-unit.id: click here if you forgot your password?
trans-unit.source: click here if you forgot your password?
trans-unit.target: Klik disini jika terlupa kata laluan anda?
Sila masukan kata laluan baru anda:

trans-unit.id: Sorry! Your recovery url has expired. Please try again.
trans-unit.source: Sorry! Your recovery url has expired. Please try again.
trans-unit.target: Harap Maaf! URL pemulihan anda telah tamat tempoh.Sila cuba lagi.

trans-unit.id: Send me my password recovery link
trans-unit.source: Send me my password recovery link
trans-unit.target: Sila kirimkan link kata laluan pemulihan saya

trans-unit.id: Enter your nickname or email address:
trans-unit.source: Enter your nickname or email address:
trans-unit.target: Masukan nama samaran atau alamat emel anda:

trans-unit.id: An email was sent to your email address.
trans-unit.source: An email was sent to your email address.
trans-unit.target: Emel telah dikirimkan ke alamat emel anda.
Kata laluan baru anda telah ditetapkan.

trans-unit.id: Please click on the following link to create your new password:
trans-unit.source: Please click on the following link to create your new password:
trans-unit.target: Sila klik link berikut untuk mencipta kata laluan baru anda:

trans-unit.id: You can use your nickname and your password at any time to access the catroid community.
trans-unit.source: You can use your nickname and your password at any time to access the catroid community.
trans-unit.target: Anda boleh mengunakan nama samaran atau kata laluan anda pada bila-bila masa untuk mengakses laman komuniti Catroid.

trans-unit.id: To do so, just visit the following page: {*catroidLoginUrl*}
trans-unit.source: To do so, just visit the following page: {*catroidLoginUrl*}
trans-unit.target: Untuk berbuat demikian, hanya lawat laman berikut: {*catroidLoginUrl*}

trans-unit.id: Your privacy and safety online are very important to us. To protect your privacy, we limit what we collect and what we publish on the website.
trans-unit.source: Your privacy and safety online are very important to us. To protect your privacy, we limit what we collect and what we publish on the website.
trans-unit.target: Pihak kami sangat menitik beratkan privasi dan keselamatan anda semasa mengunakan laman web. Untuk melindungi privasi, pihak kami telah menghadkan maklumat yang dikumpul dan maklumat yang akan disiarkan pada laman web.

trans-unit.id: You do not have to tell us anything about yourselves to download the Catroid application software. When you download the Catroid software or sign up to the website, we give you the option of telling us some things about yourself, but you do not have to fill in any of this information if you don't want to.
trans-unit.source: You do not have to tell us anything about yourselves to download the Catroid application software. When you download the Catroid software or sign up to the website, we give you the option of telling us some things about yourself, but you do not have to fill in any of this information if you don't want to.
trans-unit.target: Untuk memuat turun aplikasi perisian Catroid,anda tidak perlu memberi maklumat peribadi anda. Apabila anda ingin memuat turun perisian Catroid atau mendaftar di laman web, pihak kami akan memberi pilihan samada anda ingin memberi maklumat peribadi anda ataupun tidak.

trans-unit.id: You can try out projects on the Catroid website without registering or providing any information. As you use the website, we collect some data on where you click and which parts of the site you visit. This 'click data' helps us figure out ways to improve the website. We do not sell or rent your information to anyone.
trans-unit.source: You can try out projects on the Catroid website without registering or providing any information. As you use the website, we collect some data on where you click and which parts of the site you visit. This 'click data' helps us figure out ways to improve the website. We do not sell or rent your information to anyone.
trans-unit.target: Anda boleh mencuba projek yang terdapat di laman web Catroid tanpa mendaftar atau memberi sebarang maklumat. Semasa anda mengunakan laman web ini, pihak kami akan mengumpul data di mana anda klik dan bahagian web yang anda lawati. 'Klik data' ini akan membantu pihak kami untuk memperbaiki laman web ini.Pihak kami tidak menjual maklumat anda kepada pihak lain.

trans-unit.id: If you have questions about this privacy policy, you can use the {*contactLink*} form.
trans-unit.source: If you have questions about this privacy policy, you can use the {*contactLink*} form.
trans-unit.target: Jika anda ada sebarang pertanyaan mengenai polisi privasi, anda boleh mengunakan borang {*contactLink*}
Sila masukan kata laluan lama anda
Sila masukan kata laluan baru anda

trans-unit.id: You updated your email address successfully.
trans-unit.source: You updated your email address successfully.
trans-unit.target: Anda telah berjaya mengemaskini alamat emel anda.
Anda telah berjaya mengemaskini kata laluan anda.
Anda telah berjaya mengemaskini negara anda.

trans-unit.id: License to play - Give credit and share
trans-unit.source: License to play - Give credit and share
trans-unit.target: Lesen untuk main - Beri kredit dan kongsi
Sumbangan Kreatif yang sama - Kongsi Lesen Bersama

trans-unit.id: Imagine that each Catroid project is a cake, a very special cake that comes with its recipe (programming blocks). All members of the Catroid community share their cakes along with their recipes. This means that you can enjoy the cakes and learn how to make them yourself!
trans-unit.source: Imagine that each Catroid project is a cake, a very special cake that comes with its recipe (programming blocks). All members of the Catroid community share their cakes along with their recipes. This means that you can enjoy the cakes and learn how to make them yourself!
trans-unit.target: Bayangkan setiap projek Catroid sebagai sebiji kek yang sangat istimewa beserta dengan resipi (blok pengaturcaraan). Setiap ahli komuniti Catroid akan berkongsi kek masing-masing beserta dengan resipi. Ini bermakna, anda boleh belajar cara untuk membuat kek sambil menikmati kek tersebut.

trans-unit.id: There are no secret recipes: the instructions on how to make these cakes are open for anyone to use, reuse, modify, and serve as inspiration for new ideas... I mean cakes.
trans-unit.source: There are no secret recipes: the instructions on how to make these cakes are open for anyone to use, reuse, modify, and serve as inspiration for new ideas... I mean cakes.
trans-unit.target: Tiada resepi rahsia: setiap cara- cara untuk membuat kek ialah untuk dikongsi bersama kepada semua untuk digunakan, diubah malah sebagai inspirasi untuk idea-idea baru.

trans-unit.id: You can eat the cakes as well as copy other people's recipes to make your own, maybe with different ingredients. This freedom comes with two simple requirements:
trans-unit.source: You can eat the cakes as well as copy other people's recipes to make your own, maybe with different ingredients. This freedom comes with two simple requirements:
trans-unit.target: Anda boleh menikmati kek sambil mengunakan resipi orang lain untuk membuat kek anda sendiri, mungkin dengan mengunakan bahan-bahan yang berlainan. Kebebasan ini datang dengan dua syarat yang mudah:

trans-unit.id: share your cakes along with the recipe
trans-unit.source: share your cakes along with the recipe
trans-unit.target: kongsi kek anda bersama-sama dengan resipi

trans-unit.id: give credit to those who inspired you
trans-unit.source: give credit to those who inspired you
trans-unit.target: beri kredit kepada sesiapa yang menjadi pendorong inspirasi anda

trans-unit.id: Some people gave a name to this type of sharing: they call it {*shareAlikeLink*}. In setting up the Catroid community, we decided to adopt this approach since we believe that it supports learning and creativity within the community. By sharing recipes and ingredients (scripts and artwork), people can build upon one another's ideas and everyone will benefit.
trans-unit.source: Some people gave a name to this type of sharing: they call it {*shareAlikeLink*}. In setting up the Catroid community, we decided to adopt this approach since we believe that it supports learning and creativity within the community. By sharing recipes and ingredients (scripts and artwork), people can build upon one another's ideas and everyone will benefit.
trans-unit.target: Sesetengah orang memberikan nama kepada perkongsian ini : dikenali sebagai {*shareAlikeLink*}. Dalam pengaturan komunit Catroid, pihak kami membuat keputusan untuk mengunakan kaedah ini kerana pihak kami percaya kaedah ini akan membantu proses pembelajaran dan kreativiti dikalangan ahli komuniti. Dengan berkongsi resipi dan bahan-bahan (skrip dan hasil kerja), orang lain dapat membina idea antara satu sama lain dan setiap orang akan mendapat manfaat.

trans-unit.id: In designing the Catroid website, we included features to encourage people to share and to give credit to others. On each project page, you can always download the original scripts for the project. If you remix a project (modifying the scripts or artwork, and sharing the result), we encourage you to give credit in the Project Notes, mentioning the people and projects that inspired you.
trans-unit.source: In designing the Catroid website, we included features to encourage people to share and to give credit to others. On each project page, you can always download the original scripts for the project. If you remix a project (modifying the scripts or artwork, and sharing the result), we encourage you to give credit in the Project Notes, mentioning the people and projects that inspired you.
trans-unit.target: Dalam mereka bentuk laman web Catroid, pihak kami memasukan ciri-ciri untuk mengalakkan orang ramai untuk berkongsi dan memberikan kredit kepada orang lain. Pada setiap projek, anda boleh memuat turun skrip asal projek tersebut. Jika anda mengubah projek tersebut (mengubah skrip atau hasil kerja dan kongsi hasil), kami mengalakkan anda memberikan kredit pada Nota Projek, dengan menyatakan orang dan projek yang menjadi sumber inspirasi anda.

trans-unit.id: Learn more about the {*termsOfUseLink*} of the Catroid online community and the {*creativeCommonsLink*} initiative.
trans-unit.source: Learn more about the {*termsOfUseLink*} of the Catroid online community and the {*creativeCommonsLink*} initiative.
trans-unit.target: Belajar dengan lebih lanjut mengenai {*termsOfUseLink*} komuniti Catroid dan inisiatif {*creativeCommonsLink*} .

trans-unit.id: Please enter a nickname, a password, your email address and the country where you live.
trans-unit.source: Please enter a nickname, a password, your email address and the country where you live.
trans-unit.target: Sila masukan nama samaran, alamat emel dan negara anda.

trans-unit.id: Welcome to the Catroid community! As part of the Catroid community, you are sharing projects and ideas with people:
trans-unit.source: Welcome to the Catroid community! As part of the Catroid community, you are sharing projects and ideas with people:
trans-unit.target: Selamat datang ke laman komuniti Catroid! Sebagai sebahagian daripada komuniti Catroid, anda berkongsi projek dan idea dengan orang lain:

trans-unit.id: from many different countries and cultures
trans-unit.source: from many different countries and cultures
trans-unit.target: dari negara-negara dan budaya yang berbeza

trans-unit.id: of all ages (from young children to teens and grandparents)
trans-unit.source: of all ages (from young children to teens and grandparents)
trans-unit.target: dari lingkungan usia (dari kanak-kanak kepada remaja dan datuk nenek)

trans-unit.id: We need your help to make this community a supportive place for every member. Here's how you can help:
trans-unit.source: We need your help to make this community a supportive place for every member. Here's how you can help:
trans-unit.target: Kami memerlukan bantuan anda untuk mencipta satu suasana yang sentiasa menyokong antara satu sama lain dalam komuniti ini. Anda boleh membantu dengan:

trans-unit.id: Be respectful. When sharing projects remember that people of many different ages and backgrounds will see your contributions.
trans-unit.source: Be respectful. When sharing projects remember that people of many different ages and backgrounds will see your contributions.
trans-unit.target: Hormati orang lain. Semasa berkongsi projek, ingat bahawa orang dari linkungan usia yang berbeza dan latar belakang yang berbeza akan melihat sumbangan anda.

trans-unit.id: Give credit. Feel free to make modified versions of other people's projects - just make sure to give them credit. One place to give credit is in your Project description.
trans-unit.source: Give credit. Feel free to make modified versions of other people's projects - just make sure to give them credit. One place to give credit is in your Project description.
trans-unit.target: Beri kredit. Anda bebas untuk mengubah project orang lain - dengan syarat anda memberi kredit kepada orang tersebut. Salah satu tempat untuk memberikan kredit ialah pada huraian projek anda.

trans-unit.id: Be honest. Don't pretend to be someone other than who you are or try to trick the community.
trans-unit.source: Be honest. Don't pretend to be someone other than who you are or try to trick the community.
trans-unit.target: Jujur. Jangan menyamar sebagai orang lain semasa atau cuba untuk menipu komuniti yang lain.

trans-unit.id: Keep personal information private. Don't share your email address, phone number, or other personal contact information.
trans-unit.source: Keep personal information private. Don't share your email address, phone number, or other personal contact information.
trans-unit.target: Simpan privasi maklumat peribadi. Jangan kongsi alamat emel, number telefon atau maklumat peribadi orang lain.

trans-unit.id: Help keep the site friendly. If you feel others would find a project or comment mean, insulting, too violent, or otherwise inappropriate, just click the 'report as inappropriate' button. The Catroid team will review, and may remove any project, comment or post.
trans-unit.source: Help keep the site friendly. If you feel others would find a project or comment mean, insulting, too violent, or otherwise inappropriate, just click the 'report as inappropriate' button. The Catroid team will review, and may remove any project, comment or post.
trans-unit.target: Kekalkan keharmonian laman komuniti. Jika anda mendapati orang lain memberikan komen yang menghina, terlalu ganas atau komen yang tidak wajar, hanya klik pada butang 'lapor sebagai tidak sesuai'. Kumpulan Catroid akan mengkaji dan boleh memindahkan sebarang projek, komen.

trans-unit.id: All projects shared on the Catroid website, as well as the Catroid support materials, are shared under the Creative Commons license with the conditions {*shareAlikeLink*}.
trans-unit.source: All projects shared on the Catroid website, as well as the Catroid support materials, are shared under the Creative Commons license with the conditions {*shareAlikeLink*}.
trans-unit.target: Semua projek yang dikongsi di laman web Catroid, serta bahan-bahan sokongan Catroid, dikongsi bersama di bawah lesen Creative Common dengan syarat {*shareAlikeLink*}.

trans-unit.id: The Catroid software and the Catroid website are completely free of charge. The source code of the Catroid software is available under the {*gnuLink*}, the source code of the website is available under the {*gnuAfferoLink*}.
trans-unit.source: The Catroid software and the Catroid website are completely free of charge. The source code of the Catroid software is available under the {*gnuLink*}, the source code of the website is available under the {*gnuAfferoLink*}.
trans-unit.target: Perisian Catroid dan laman web Catroid adalah percuma. Kod sumber perisian Catroid boleh didapati di bawah sumber kod {*gnuLink*}, kod sumber laman web Catroid boleh didapati di bawah {*gnuAfferoLink*}.

trans-unit.id: You can visit the project at {*googleCodeLink*}.
trans-unit.source: You can visit the project at {*googleCodeLink*}.

trans-unit.id: Check back here from time-to-time, because we are always trying to improve our guidelines. Please mail any suggestions regarding these Terms of Use to {*emailLink*}.
trans-unit.source: Check back here from time-to-time, because we are always trying to improve our guidelines. Please mail any suggestions regarding these Terms of Use to {*emailLink*}.
trans-unit.target: Periksa laman ini dari semasa ke semasa, kerana pihak kami sentiasa mencuba untuk memperbaiki garis panduan kami. Sila emel cadangan menganai Syarat-syarat Pengunaan ke {*emailLink*}.

trans-unit.id: Thank you for joining and contributing to the Catroid community!
trans-unit.source: Thank you for joining and contributing to the Catroid community!
trans-unit.target: Terima kasih kerana menyertai dan menyumbangkan kepada komuniti Catroid!

trans-unit.id: No entry was found for the given ID.
trans-unit.source: No entry was found for the given ID.
trans-unit.target: Tiada entri yang dijumpai untuk ID yang diberikan.

trans-unit.id: There was an error while sending e-mail message. Maybe your mailserver is out of order?
trans-unit.source: There was an error while sending e-mail message. Maybe your mailserver is out of order?
trans-unit.target: Ralat ketika menghantar emel. Mungkin mailserver anda ada masalah?

trans-unit.id: POST-Data not correct or missing! Required: projectTitle and file-data upload.
trans-unit.source: POST-Data not correct or missing! Required: projectTitle and file-data upload.
trans-unit.target: POST-Data tidak betul atau hilang! Tajuk projek dan fail data yang diupload diperlukan.

trans-unit.id: Client did not send fileChecksum! Are you using an outdated Catroid version?
trans-unit.source: Client did not send fileChecksum! Are you using an outdated Catroid version?
trans-unit.target: Pelanggan tidak menghantar Checksum fail! Adakah anda mengunakan Catroid versi lama?

trans-unit.id: The checksum of the uploaded file differs from the checksum generated by the client!
trans-unit.source: The checksum of the uploaded file differs from the checksum generated by the client!
trans-unit.target: Fail checksum yang dimuat naik berbeza dengan checksum yang dijana oleh pelanggan!

trans-unit.id: The size of the project file exceed the max filesize limit!
trans-unit.source: The size of the project file exceed the max filesize limit!
trans-unit.target: Saiz projek melebihi had maksima saiz fail!

trans-unit.id: Uploading projects named with the default project name is not allowed.
trans-unit.source: Uploading projects named with the default project name is not allowed.
trans-unit.target: Memuat naik projek dengan nama project asal tidak dibenarkan.

trans-unit.id: There are insulting words in the project title!
trans-unit.source: There are insulting words in the project title!
trans-unit.target: Terdapat perkataan yang menghina tajuk projek!

trans-unit.id: There are insulting words in the project description!
trans-unit.source: There are insulting words in the project description!
trans-unit.target: Terdapat perkataan yang menghina huraian projek!

trans-unit.id: One of the SQL queries in the BadWordsFilter class failed!
trans-unit.source: One of the SQL queries in the BadWordsFilter class failed!
trans-unit.target: Salah satu kueri SQL dalam kelas BadWordsFilter telah gagal!

trans-unit.id: Could not find requested file on server
trans-unit.source: Could not find requested file on server
trans-unit.target: Fail yang diminta dari server tidak ditemui

trans-unit.id: POST-Data not correct or missing! Required: projectId and flagReason.
trans-unit.source: POST-Data not correct or missing! Required: projectId and flagReason.
trans-unit.target: POST-Data tidak betul atau hilang! projectId dan flagReason diperlukan.

trans-unit.id: Could not find html viewer file.
trans-unit.source: Could not find html viewer file.
trans-unit.target: Tidak dapat mencari fail html viewer.

trans-unit.id: Could not find necessary module for ajax request
trans-unit.source: Could not find necessary module for ajax request
trans-unit.target: Tidak menjumpai modul yang sesuai untuk permintaan ajax

trans-unit.id: The password or username was incorrect.
trans-unit.source: The password or username was incorrect.
trans-unit.target: Kata laluan atau nama pengguna tidak betul.

trans-unit.id: The response of the mediawiki API was incorrect.
trans-unit.source: The response of the mediawiki API was incorrect.
trans-unit.target: Tindak balas mediawiki API tidak tepat.

trans-unit.id: Authentication of device failed: invalid auth-token!
trans-unit.source: Authentication of device failed: invalid auth-token!
trans-unit.target: Pengesahan alat gagal: auth-token tidak sah!

trans-unit.id: The email address is not valid.
trans-unit.source: The email address is not valid.

trans-unit.id: The password differs from the repeated password.
trans-unit.source: The password differs from the repeated password.
trans-unit.target: Kata laluan tidak sama dengan kata laluan berulang.

trans-unit.id: Your password must have at least {*minimumPasswordLength*} and maximal {*maximumPasswordLength*} characters.
trans-unit.source: Your password must have at least {*minimumPasswordLength*} and maximal {*maximumPasswordLength*} characters.
trans-unit.target: Kata laluan anda mesti mempunyai sekurang-kurangnya {*minimumPasswordLength*} dan maksimum {*maximumPasswordLength*} aksara.

trans-unit.id: The password must differ from the nickname.
trans-unit.source: The password must differ from the nickname.
trans-unit.target: Kata laluan mesti berbeza dari nama samaran.

trans-unit.id: The nickname is invalid. Underscores (_) are not allowed.
trans-unit.source: The nickname is invalid. Underscores (_) are not allowed.
trans-unit.target: Nama samaran tidak sah. Pengunaan garis bawah (_) adalah tidak dibenarkan.

trans-unit.id: The nickname is invalid. Hash signs (#) are not allowed.
trans-unit.source: The nickname is invalid. Hash signs (#) are not allowed.
trans-unit.target: Nama samaran tidak sah. Tanda hash (#) adalah tidak dibenarkan.

trans-unit.id: The nickname is invalid. Vertical bars (|) are not allowed.
trans-unit.source: The nickname is invalid. Vertical bars (|) are not allowed.
trans-unit.target: Nama samaran tidak sah. Bar menegak (|) tidak dibenarkan.

trans-unit.id: The nickname is invalid. Curly braces ({ or }) are not allowed.
trans-unit.source: The nickname is invalid. Curly braces ({ or }) are not allowed.
trans-unit.target: Nama samaran tidak sah.Pengunaan ({ atau }) tidak dibenarkan.

trans-unit.id: The nickname is invalid. Less than or greater than signs (< or >) are not allowed.
trans-unit.source: The nickname is invalid. Less than or greater than signs (< or >) are not allowed.
trans-unit.target: Nama samaran tidak sah. Tanda kurang daripada atau lebih daripada (< atau >) adalah tidak dibenarkan.

trans-unit.id: The nickname is invalid. Square brackets ([ or ]) are not allowed.
trans-unit.source: The nickname is invalid. Square brackets ([ or ]) are not allowed.
trans-unit.target: Nama samaran tidak sah. Pengunaan ([ atau]) adalah tidak dibenarkan.

trans-unit.id: This nickname is on the blacklist and not allowed.
trans-unit.source: This nickname is on the blacklist and not allowed.
trans-unit.target: Nama samaran ini terdapat dalam senarai hitam dan tidak boleh digunakan.

trans-unit.id: There are no countries available in DB.
trans-unit.source: There are no countries available in DB.

trans-unit.id: There are insulting words in the username field!
trans-unit.source: There are insulting words in the username field!
trans-unit.target: Terdapat pengunaan perkataan yang menghina pada kotak nama penguna!

trans-unit.id: There are insulting words in the email address field!
trans-unit.source: There are insulting words in the email address field!
trans-unit.target: Terdapat perkataan yang menghina pada kotak alamat emel!

trans-unit.id: There are insulting words in the city field!
trans-unit.source: There are insulting words in the city field!
trans-unit.target: Terdapat perkataan yang menghina pada kotak bandar!

trans-unit.id: There are insulting words in the province field!
trans-unit.source: There are insulting words in the province field!
trans-unit.target: Terdapat perkataan yang menghina pada kotak wilayah!

trans-unit.id: The nickname or email address is invalid.
trans-unit.source: The nickname or email address is invalid.
trans-unit.target: Nama samaran atau alamat emel tidak sah.

trans-unit.id: The nickname or email address is missing.
trans-unit.source: The nickname or email address is missing.
trans-unit.target: Nama samaran atau alamat emel tidak lengkap.

trans-unit.id: The nickname or email address was not found.
trans-unit.source: The nickname or email address was not found.
trans-unit.target: Nama samaran atau alamat emel tidak dijumpai.

trans-unit.id: Ooooops something went wrong. Please try again!
trans-unit.source: Ooooops something went wrong. Please try again!

trans-unit.id: Ooooops something went wrong. Please try again or contact the administrator at {*webmasterEmailAddress*}.
trans-unit.source: Ooooops something went wrong. Please try again or contact the administrator at {*webmasterEmailAddress*}.
trans-unit.target: Sila cuba lagi atau hubungi pihak pentadbir di {*webmasterEmailAddress*}.

trans-unit.id: Sorry! Your recovery URL has expired.
trans-unit.source: Sorry! Your recovery URL has expired.
trans-unit.target: Mohon maaf, URL pemulihan anda sudah tamat tempoh.

trans-unit.id: The new password must have at least {*minimumPasswordLength*} characters.
trans-unit.source: The new password must have at least {*minimumPasswordLength*} characters.
trans-unit.target: Kata Laluan baru mesti mempunyai sekurang-kurangnya {*minumumPasswordLength*} abjad.

trans-unit.id: There was a problem while updating the email address.
trans-unit.source: There was a problem while updating the email address.
trans-unit.target: Ada masalah ketika membaharui alamat emel.

trans-unit.id: There was an error while sending e-mail message. Please contact the administrator at {*webmasterEmailAddress*}.
trans-unit.source: There was an error while sending e-mail message. Please contact the administrator at {*webmasterEmailAddress*}.
trans-unit.target: Ada ralat ketika menghantar mesej emel. Sila hubungi pihak pentadbir di {*webmasterEmailAddress*}.

trans-unit.id: You need to specify a title for your project!
trans-unit.source: You need to specify a title for your project!
trans-unit.target: Anda perlu menentukan tajuk untuk projeck anda!

trans-unit.id: Sorry, there was a problem during the upload! Are you using the latest version of Catroid?
trans-unit.source: Sorry, there was a problem during the upload! Are you using the latest version of Catroid?
trans-unit.target: Mohon maaf, masalah ketika muat naik! Adakah anda sedang memakai versi Catroid yang terbaru?

trans-unit.id: Sorry, there was an error during the upload. Try again!
trans-unit.source: Sorry, there was an error during the upload. Try again!
trans-unit.target: Mohon Maad, Ada ralat ketika muatnaik. Sila cuba lagi!

trans-unit.id: Your project file is too large.
trans-unit.source: Your project file is too large.

trans-unit.id: You have to rename your project, before uploading it.
trans-unit.source: You have to rename your project, before uploading it.
trans-unit.target: Anda perlu memberi nama baru kepada project anda, sebelum muatnaik.

trans-unit.id: Please don't use offensive language in your project title.
trans-unit.source: Please don't use offensive language in your project title.
trans-unit.target: Sila jangan menggunakkan bahasa yang kasar dalam tajuk projeck anda.

trans-unit.id: Please don't use offensive language in your project description.
trans-unit.source: Please don't use offensive language in your project description.
trans-unit.target: Sila jangan menggunakkan bahasa yang kasar dalam penerangan projeck anda.

trans-unit.id: The requested project is not available at the time. Try again later!
trans-unit.source: The requested project is not available at the time. Try again later!
trans-unit.target: Project yang diminta tidak terdapat pada masa ini. Sila cuba lagi nanti!

trans-unit.id: You must enter a reason why you want to report this project as inappropriate!
trans-unit.source: You must enter a reason why you want to report this project as inappropriate!
trans-unit.target: Anda perlu memasukkan sebab kenapa anda mahu melaporkan projek ini kurang sesuai!

trans-unit.id: Sorry, there was an error while reporting the project!
trans-unit.source: Sorry, there was an error while reporting the project!
trans-unit.target: Mohon maaf, ada masalah ketika melaporkan projeck!

trans-unit.id: Your password or nickname was incorrect.
trans-unit.source: Your password or nickname was incorrect.
trans-unit.target: Kata Laluan dan nama samaran anda tidak betul.

trans-unit.id: Sorry, there was a problem: check your nickname and password.
trans-unit.source: Sorry, there was a problem: check your nickname and password.
trans-unit.target: Mohon maaf, ada masalah: sila periksa nama samaran dan kata laluan anda.

trans-unit.id: This email address is not valid.
trans-unit.source: This email address is not valid.

trans-unit.target: Ulang kata laluan anda tidak lengkap.

trans-unit.id: An error occured selecting a country! Please try to reload page or try again later.
trans-unit.source: An error occured selecting a country! Please try to reload page or try again later.
trans-unit.target: Ralat ketika memilih negara anda. Sila buka semula halaman ini atau cuba lagi nanti.

trans-unit.id: There are insulting words in the nickname field!
trans-unit.source: There are insulting words in the nickname field!
trans-unit.target: Terdapat perkataan yang menghina dalam kotak nama samaran!

trans-unit.id: Your nickname or email address is invalid.
trans-unit.source: Your nickname or email address is invalid.
trans-unit.target: Nama samaran atau alamat emel anda tidak sah

trans-unit.id: Your nickname or email address is missing.
trans-unit.source: Your nickname or email address is missing.
trans-unit.target: Nama samaran atau alamat emel anda tidak lengkap.

trans-unit.id: Your nickname or email address was not found.
trans-unit.source: Your nickname or email address was not found.
trans-unit.target: Nama samaran atau alamat emel anda tidak dijumpa.

alt-trans.target: Nama samaran atau alamat emel anda tidak dijumpai.
